price: Hiyo ni starehe ndogo. Kisha makaazi yao yatakuwa Jahannamu. Na ni mahali pabaya mno pa kupumzikia.
arabic: مَتَٰعٞ قَلِيلٞ ثُمَّ مَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ
footnotes: Hizo ni starehe za kupita njia, na kila kipitacho ni duni. Kisha marejeo ya daima watayo ishia ni Jahannamu. Na hapana makaazi maovu kama Jahannamu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: matāʿun qalīlun thumma mawāhum jahannamu wabi'sa al-mihādu
